channel.title: [HELP ME]Unfreezing error
channel.description:
whenever i try running a server i got an error saying "error unfreezing players" heres what the bat file says
C:\users\greg_and_chris\desktop\rsc server\Divine pk v5.0\Server>set PATH=C:\Pro gram Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;C:\Program Files\CC386\bin;C:\Windows\system32;; C:\Program Files\Subversion\bin;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\Common\ Tools\WinNT;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\Common\MSDev98\Bin;C:\Progr am Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\Common\Tools;C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\VC98\bin;C:\Program Files\Javac\jdk1.6.0_03\bin ;C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin C:\users\greg_and_chris\desktop\rsc server\Divine pk v5.0\Server>set JAVA_HOME=C :\Program\Java\jdk1.6.0_04 C:\users\greg_and_chris\desktop\rsc server\Divine pk v5.0\Server>ant demonikp2p Buildfile: build.xml demonikp2p: [java] [15:20:27 20-09-08] Server starting up... [java] .\conf [java] [15:20:29 20-09-08] Communications link failure due to underlying ex ception: [java] [java] ** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION ** [java] [java] java.net.SocketException [java] MESSAGE: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect [java] [java] STACKTRACE: [java] [java] java.net.SocketException: java.net.ConnectException: Connection refu sed: connect [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFa ctory.java:156) [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.(MysqlIO.java:284) [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2565) [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.(Connection.java:1485) [java] at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDri ver.java:266) [java] [15:20:29 20-09-08] Connected to MySQL [java] at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:582) [java] at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:185) [java] at com.rscd.sql.DatabaseManager.getDatabaseConnection(DatabaseMa nager.java:34) [java] at com.rscd.Server.main(Server.java:52) [java] [java] [java] ** END NESTED EXCEPTION ** [java] [java] [java] [java] Last packet sent to the server was 13 ms ago. [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou ndary (201,748) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou ndary (198,749) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou ndary (201,748) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou ndary (196,748) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou ndary (199,752) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: minY > maxY (754,746) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] 190 has an invalid NpcLoc: startY outside of bou ndary (200,750) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] com.rscd.packethandler.ProcessNameHandler [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] GameEngine now running [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] Address already in use: bind [java] java.lang.NullPointerException [java] at com.rscd.Server.main(Server.java:59) [java] [15:20:31 20-09-08] The server encountered an error while unfreezing players

item.title: [HELP ME]Unfreezing error
item.dc:creator: @Love_Classic Love Classic
item.description:
@Love_Classic wrote:

Lol i get that error when i forgot running Wampserver,
So make sure wamp is running with the www file inside.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP ME]Unfreezing error
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

Lol… He’s basically tried to run a server without a mysql server… That’s really only problem their.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP ME]Unfreezing error
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

The npcloc.xml isnt causing the error, Thats just some chaos dwarfs out of bounds is all, Pm me your msn ringer, And i’ll teamview you, And fix the problem.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP ME]Unfreezing error
item.dc:creator: @KO9 KO9
item.description:
@KO9 wrote:

Read the error messages.

Start your MySQL server
Fix your npcloc.xml file

And close any other applications which are using the same port.

Then throw your PC out the window and run head on into a wall.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP ME]Unfreezing error
item.dc:creator: @ringer24 ringer24
item.description:
@ringer24 wrote:

do i need to edit the sql file?

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP ME]Unfreezing error
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Try ctrl+alt+del, End any java applications? Your server is already running in the background.

Also maybe just try uploading a new demonik_lsd db?

Read full topic
